blog.name: jenkinsjester
blog.title: we don't do anything with dignity
blog.description:
Kelli. 28. she/her. bisexual disaster. Critical Role. Rooster Teeth. Achievement Hunter. various other nerdy things. we are Vex stans first, and people second. In this house, we love and respect Marisha Ray, Laura Bailey, and Ashley Johnson. always accepting fic prompts
  • I write things sometimes
  • I tweet things even less
  • Critical Role Fic

summary: “Okay, Beauregard, I have an easy one for you,” Caleb says, adorably invested for someone who didn’t want to play this game...
body:
“Okay, Beauregard, I have an easy one for you,” Caleb says, adorably invested for someone who didn’t want to play this game fifteen minutes ago. “Jester, Fjord, and…” He pauses for dramatic effect, a shit-eating grin on his face. “Yasha.”

Beau laughs, takes another swig from Nott’s flask. “Okay, okay.” She nods, takes another drink before handing the flask off. “Fuck Jester,” she starts, prompting a celebratory whoop from the tiefling. “Marry Yasha. Which I guess means I’m killing Fjord.” She pats his bicep. “Sorry, buddy.”

Fjord makes an indignant noise. “Why does everyone want to kill me? I don’t get any love?”

“You’re just a shifty guy,” Nott says at the same time Jester says, “I would fuck you, Fjord.”

He sighs, blushing furiously. “I know y’would, Jes. Thanks.”

Beau laughs, turning on Molly. “Alright, asshole, your turn.” Her grin turns wicked. “Fuck, marry, or kill: Caleb, Fjord, and Yasha.”

Molly gapes at her, floundering for a moment. “Well, not to make things potentially awkward as roommates, but I would fuck Fjord,” he says very quickly. “I’d marry Yasha, mostly to piss of Beau, but also because I could never hurt you, darling. So, that just leaves…killing…Caleb…” He trails off awkwardly, snagging the flask from Fjord and drinking deep.

For his part, Caleb just smiles and says softly, “I would like to see you try, Mollymauk.”

“Did I really do that?” Molly groans later that night. He’s rooming with Beau and Yasha tonight, Jester having cheerfully kicked him out of his and Fjord’s room. “Did I really get a chance to play Fuck/Marry/Kill with Caleb, only to tell him I would kill him?”

Beau snorts. “Yeah, dude, you totally shit the bed on that one.” She giggles, something they only get to hear when she’s drunk. “Who knew you were a bigger fucking disaster than Fjord?”

“I knew,” Yasha says, smirking.

Molly groans louder, burying his face in a pillow. If he tries really hard, he thinks he could end it all. “I’m never going to be able to look him in the face again,” he wails.

Yasha pats his ankle gently. “There there.”

“Look on the bright side, Molls,” Beau says. “At least we didn’t play under Zone of Truth like Jester suggested. Who knows what kind of shit you would have said.”

He flips her off weakly, still contemplating death by pillow. “I am a hot fucking mess, and should not be in control of my life choices,” he announces. “Yasha, from now on, you make all of my decisions for me.”

“Okay,” she says, and her tone of voice does not bode well for Molly. “I have decided that you are going to tell Caleb that you’re in love with him.”

His horrified wail is only somewhat muffled by the pillow. “Fuck,” he groans. “I really didn’t think that through.”

summary: taliesin has worn this x-men hoodie often, but it’s most notable appearance was halloween 2015. the hoodie is made by destructo...
caption: taliesin has worn this x-men hoodie often, but it’s most notable appearance was halloween 2015. the hoodie is made by destructo disc designs and goes for $69, but it is no longer available. however, the company prints in small batches and may bring the design back in the future.

tags: percival frederickstein von mussel klossowski de rolo III
summary:
Your Father, Percival
Part Two: Percival Fredrickstein IV
title:
Your Father, Percival
Part Two: Percival Fredrickstein IV
body:
Originally posted on ao3

Part One

Percy writes a letter to each of his children when they are born, as well as one to Vex.

The next letter Percy wrote was to his son the morning after he was born. The birth was near-similar to Elaina’s, who was now four. His daughter was asleep next to Vex on his side of the bed, tuckered out from the excitement of a new baby brother, and their son was wide awake but so quite and content in the cradle beside their bed.

To Percival Fredrickstein IV,

First, I would very much like to apologize for the atrociously long line of names you have inherited. You are a de Rolo, through and through, and grandiose names there will be. Your mother insisted on the name and if I’m being honest, it just felt right - after a bit of persuading on her end. Please do not hate me for this. However, we have agreed that for your own sake we’d find a nickname best suited for you. Your mother immediately took to calling you Freddy, and it spread through our family like a wildfire.

It’s simple, but it’s more sentimental of a name than it seems. Your late uncle used to call me a handful of nicknames, ones that I will not get into at the moment, but “Freddy” was one of them. I won’t be surprised if I respond to your name every now and again…It’s an endearment of the past that I guess I truly miss.

Your sister, Elaina, was more excited for your arrival than the rest of us, I believe. For the months since we told her, she had been asking if you were here and ready to play yet. What was truly unexpected, but so heartwarming, was how gentle she was with you. I swear, my heart grew two sizes the moment your mother placed you in her arms. Elaina, normally the energetic little girl who could even tire out Grog, was so careful. She is going to be a wonderful big sister. As I write, she is asleep with your mother, and you, meanwhile, are completely awake but so strangely quiet as you stare at the mobile that hangs above you.

You cried once, just for a short while as you were born, and if this remains I might have to say you take after me as a child. However, I just hope you do not inherit the anger and fear I had when I grew older. It’s been a long, long time since any of that occurred.

I hope you do not hold back and that your childhood is happier than mine, that you live as unafraid and rambunctious as a child should. Wreck havoc over us with your sister, explore with your mother, and I’ll show you some of my favorite books. I never thought I would be this lucky in life; I have your sister, I have your mother, I have our strange family, and now I have you. I am so proud, Freddy, and I hope that I can teach you to be a better man that I ever was.

Know that I love you dearly.

Your father,

Percival
body_abstract:
Originally posted on ao3

Part One

Percy writes a letter to each of his children when they are born, as well as one to Vex.

question: Beau/Yasha, 94 (Hair Brushing/Braiding) Thank you! :)
answer:
harold theyre LESBIANS and therefore i might have altered the prompt ever-so-slightly whoops

“Please, really,” said Yasha as she knelt in the grass just outside their campsite and pressed the dagger’s edge to the base of Beau’s skull, “I need you to hold absolutely still while I do this. The sunlight is perfect now.”

Beau, who could feel Yasha’s arm gently brushing against her back and could see locks of ivory-white hair just at the edge of her vision, swallowed hard. 

“Sorry, sorry,” she said, trying to move as little as possible. “It’s just…er…I’m bad at that, sorry,” she finished lamely.

“That is fine,” said Yasha, and now cold metal began scraping along the outline of Beau’s undercut. “I am not good at staying in one place either.”

Beau scoffed, and then regretted scoffing when she heard Yasha give a sharp intake of breath at her movement. “Sorry,” she said again. “It’s just funny you’d say that, y’know, ‘cause…‘cause you leave all the time…”

She trailed off, as the dagger made its way around her ear.

“I apologize for always disappearing,” Yasha sighed. “I just…I just have to, you know?”

Beau considered that for a moment, and thought of the night she climbed through the window of her dormitory at the Cobalt Soul, under a starless sky, up on the roofs of Zadash, and smiled faintly. “Yeah,” she said. “Yeah…I think I do know.”

“But I do like this group,” Yasha said with a nod. “When I leave, now, I know I will always come back. You…you…I care about. You, you and everybody, I mean. Er…”

Beau felt her smile widen into a dopey grin, and her cheeks colored. “Good,” she squeaked, and then cleared her throat. “I mean, er, good. I, um, I care about you too.”

“Oh,” said Yasha, and the dagger faltered just so before picking up again. “That is…that is good to hear.”

They sat there in a silence that was half-awkward, half-ecstatic, buzzing with a strange warmth, until Yasha finally pulled away and declared, “Alright. You are done.”

Beau rubbed at the back of her head with her hand, and beamed. “Damn, Yasha. Caleb wasn’t kidding. You really are good at this.”

“Thank you,” Yasha said, and her lips quirked upwards. “I have had practice.”

“It really is a great—” 

Beau paused, and then suddenly started fidgeting. “Oh, gods,” she said, and then squirmed again. “Oh gods, there are tiny hairs in my robes. I need a bath right now, where is that damn river?”

“Just over there, I can come with you,” Yasha offered a little too quickly. “In case, er, in case you need help. I am sure some hair also got down your back. If…if you would like…”

“Yes,” Beau said immediately. “Yes, yes please.”

If you want me to write a drabble, check out this post here and feel free to send something in!  💜💜💜 💜💜💜 💜💜💜

For your twinsies needs.

Even if I’m still very early on in Campaign 1, this line already has my heart and Liam’s onesie for little Ronin inspired me to draw this,with one finger, on my tablet lol

EDIT: It’s meant to be read clockwise I’ve had 3 people read it “do not me go far from” already LMAO

body:
Morosexual meme except it’s Keyleth or Gilmore and Vax and Vax’s dumb thing is teleporting into a dragon

Caleb and Molly and Molly’s dumb thing is “I don’t know anything. It’s part of my charm.”
